Header: Police intensify investigations into rape of Kilinochchi teenager
Content: According to the Chief Inspector of Police in Kilinochchi, the fifteen-year-old girl who was a victim of rape in Kilinochchi, has been subjected to  judicial medical examinations and the investigations into the incident have been accelerated. It is also said that the parents of the victim have lodged a complaint with the Police Women and Children’s Bureau in Kilinochchi with regard to the incident. It is learnt that the suspects have fled the area and investigations are underway to arrest them. Meanwhile, the fifteen-year-old suspect in the rape of a seven-year-old girl in Kilinochchi has been remanded until June 17. The Chief Inspector of Police in Kilinochchi stated that the suspect was remanded subsequent to identification tests as further investigations continue into the incident.
